title: Meredith Vieira & Joy Behar
description:
As two of the original five co-hosts on "The View" in 1997, Meredith Vieira and Joy Behar have seen it all! From being hired by Barbara Walters, to leaving, and even Behar returning to the daytime talk show, the two friends discuss how their experience on the show has changed them and reflect on how the show has evolved over the years. Hear about their dressing room chats and go behind the scenes of the moments that made "The View" what it is today.
Listen to "The View" weekdays on your favorite podcast app! Just search for "The View" on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you like to listen. For more: https://abcaudio.com/podcasts/the-view
